content.text: Significant changes focus on resolving linter warnings, utilizing type guard definitions, and updating import protocols to modern standards.
New features and plugins include updates to MultiversX for access token management, Zilliqa blockchain support, and further enhancements to the Trikon, Apro, and Gelato relay plugins.

Updates have been made to various documentations including embedding functions and client telegram README.md for improved clarity and configuration details.
The AI Agent online hackathon has been announced by Safe Agentathon, inviting builders to explore AI x Crypto stacks.
